question: You have recently landed in a foreign country on a work visa and need information about the place in and around the city. Write a letter to the relocation assistance provider seeking help and in your letter, Write why you are writing the letter What kind of information you want How and by when you can get the requested information
text: I am writing to get some information about my destination, I have been reaching  this country since 1 hour ago,I have some questions from you who know a lot about this country also I hope you can help me because I am totally unfamiliar with this country and I am distracted.

I used to search on the internet about how I can find a good job and an apartment but I could not find a good result on the internet, for this , the reason I wanted to ask you, can you help me with one area where is good for renting an apartment also do you think I can find a job in the suburb or do you have a special offer for me.

I can receive your answer from my email or you can send a message through  Whatsapp, furthermore, I am free next week and I can wait for your message, I am going to stay at the hotel for one month till I get your help,
I am looking forward to receiving your answer.
